title: Tandem Theory identifies seven key CRM lifecycle stages
statement: Tandem Theory defines CRM as a lifecycle composed of seven stages: Lead Management, Contact & Profile Management, Customer Communication, Sales Enablement, Marketing Automation, Customer Service & Support, and Loyalty & Retention.

citations.quote: CRM as a lifecycle composed of seven key stages: Lead Management, Contact & Profile Management, Customer Communication, Sales Enablement, Marketing Automation, Customer Service & Support, Loyalty & Retention
